it can take off at little over 40m/s and looks like the B-2 Spirit Bomber

Why not imbed?

Here's your album:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Just type:

{imgur}The numbers at the end of the imgur album url which is QWcQP in this case{/imgur}

except with [] instead of {}

The plane looks nice and sleek, although the B-2 isn't what first came to mind when I saw it. It sort of looks more like a B-1B with a clipped fuselage, IMO.

-Ojimak

lol, the title reminded me of the Norman Greenbaum song.
